page.title: 08Playground Games
page.content: Bobs and Excuses is a game where you have one person who turns away with their back to the other people that are playing. Then you take it in turns to put your hands on the persons back. That person says five bobs five excuses or something like that but it all has to come to ten. Then the person who had his back to the other people chases. If he or she gets near you, you can either say bob and bob down or say an excuses like "I've broken my leg" then you can't run until someone hits you. You can only use your amount of bobs and excuses when the person catches someone the person who he or she has caught is{It.
